items.sentence: I\'d like to know why women live longer than men.
Tom thought that Mary would like Indonesian food.
Tom threw the baseball to Mary and she caught it.
Tom told Mary not to put any sugar in his coffee.
You should brush your teeth at least twice a day.
Tom was a very good skier when he was a teenager.
Tom was afraid to stand on the edge of the cliff.
Tom was greatly affected by the death of his son.
Why on earth did you sell your newly-built house?
I used to dream about becoming a race car driver.
